remarks: Rearrange a composition of 4 translations, analogous to ~ an4 . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2013.)
statement:
ltrncom.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrncom.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnco4 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ E e. T /\ F e. T ) -> ( ( D o. E ) o. ( F o. G ) ) = ( ( D o. F ) o. ( E o. G ) ) ) $.
